oracle_query: select id from customer where rownum=1
select value from orders where rownum=1

correct_query: select * from (select *, row_number() over (order by id) as rn from employee) t where rn = 1

oracle_query: SELECT emp_id FROM Employees WHERE ROWNUM=1
incorrect_query: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT emp_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS rn FROM Employees ) t WHERE rn = 1
correct_query: select * from (select *, row_number() over (order by id) as rn from employee) t where rn = 1
